message: Attribute “cz-shortcut-listen” not allowed on element “body” at this point.
Bad value “100%” for attribute “width” on element “iframe”: Expected a digit but saw “%” instead.
extract:
<iframe id="app" src="/frontend/auto/form" width="100%"
                                            style="transition: height 0.3s ease 0s; border: 0px; overflow: hidden; height: 1819px;"
                                            scrolling="no"></ifra

message: The “scrolling” attribute on the “iframe” element is obsolete. Use CSS instead.
extract:
<iframe id="app" src="/frontend/auto/form" width="100%"
                                            style="transition: height 0.3s ease 0s; border: 0px; overflow: hidden; height: 1819px;"
                                            scrolling="no"></ifra
